comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Lady Henry Somerset, owner of vast estates, was a leading British philanthropist, and president of the British Women's Temperance Union. T. P. O'Connor was both a member of Parliament and a journalist, who founded and was first editor of several British newspapers: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/T_P_O'Connor

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Possibly Louise Emily Harford (1864–1945), wife of Henry Somerset, 9th Duke of Beaufort.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Rather Isabella Caroline Somers-Cocks (3 August 1851 - 12 March 1921), wife of Lord Henry Richard Charles Somerset (younger brother of Henry Somerset, 9th Duke of Beaufort). en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lady_Henry_Somerset

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to all of you for identifying these people. We'll fill in the names the next time we update the record.
